tool_description: GreenHouseGas/CO2 compensation as a service. Get 1kg/month for free to see how easy it is to implement.
name: CO2 Offset
title: CO2 Offset

api_list.name: List existing Compensations
api_list.description: Returns a list of all existing co2offset certificates linked to account.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://co2-offset.p.rapidapi.com/compensations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "co2-offset.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://co2-offset.p.rapidapi.com/compensations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "co2-offset.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retrieve Compensation
api_list.description: Response contains full compensation details (if exists, and owner is account).
